participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and supportive, with a passion for cooking and design.
participant_1.background: I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love. I would love to learn more about sports nutrition so I can help my son improve his game. I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love. i am constantly drinking. I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.

participant_2.name: Eli
participant_2.personality: Creative and determined, with a love for storytelling and a desire to overcome challenges.
participant_2.background: My favorite websites are those that help me learn more about asthma and how to manage it. i also enjoy reading the game of thrones series books. I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories. i like listening to blues music. I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.

content.text: Hey how are you doing today
I am doing well, a little stressed but overall good
What is stressing you out?
I am trying to find a job that will help me support myself while I write my own stories
That is tough, but I know you can do it! What kind of stories do you write?
I write a lot of fantasy and sci fi, but I also love writing murder mysteries
That sounds awesome! I would love to read some of your work if you have anything published
I do not have anything published yet, but I am working on it!
Well good luck! I hope you find your dream job soon and get to share your stories with the world
Thank you! I appreciate that
No problem! What do you like to do to relax?
I like to read, listen to music, and spend time with my friends and family
That sounds like a great way to relax! I love reading and listening to music too
What are some of your favorite books and music?
I love reading the Game of Thrones series and I love listening to blues music
I have not read the Game of Thrones series but I have heard great things about it! I love listening to blues music too
It is a great series, you should definitely check it out!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
You too!
